column1: Allows product attributes to be displayed in the drag-and-drop window. Use commas ',' to separate multiple attribute codes.
column2: Allows product attributes to be displayed in the drag-and-drop window. Use commas ',' to separate multiple attribute codes.

column1: Default number of columns in the drag-and-drop window.
column2: Default number of columns in the drag-and-drop window.

column1: If set to 'Yes' (recommended), then when a category is saved any changes that need to be considered for smart category rules are queued for processing by cron.
column2: If set to 'Yes' (recommended), then when a category is saved any changes that need to be considered for smart category rules are queued for processing by cron.

column1: If set to 'Yes' (recommended), then when a product is saved any changes to attributes that need to be considered for smart category rules are queued for processing by cron.
column2: If set to 'Yes' (recommended), then when a product is saved any changes to attributes that need to be considered for smart category rules are queued for processing by cron.

column1: Move out of stock to bottom
column2: Move out of stock to bottom

column1: Only include products matched by rules
column2: Only include products matched by rules

column1: Please enter SKUs below, one per line.
column2: Please enter SKUs below, one per line.

column1: Queued updates to categories will only be processed automatically if this is set to 'Yes' (recommended).
column2: Queued updates to categories will only be processed automatically if this is set to 'Yes' (recommended).

column1: Rebuild Category Products for Smart Categories
column2: Rebuild Category Products for Smart Categories

column1: Shows product creation dates in the drag-and-drop window.
column2: Shows product creation dates in the drag-and-drop window.

column1: Smart Category: Select the attributes to use
column2: Smart Category: Select the attributes to use

column1: This hides products in the drag-and-drop window that are disabled.
column2: This hides products in the drag-and-drop window that are disabled.

column1: This hides products in the drag-and-drop window that have their visibility set to 'Not Visible Individually'.
column2: This hides products in the drag-and-drop window that have their visibility set to 'Not Visible Individually'.

column1: This is the current schedule that category updates are processed.
column2: This is the current schedule that category updates are processed.

column1: This option shows additional gallery images for each product as thumbnails.
column2: This option shows additional gallery images for each product as thumbnails.

column1: This prevents manual updating of category positions in Manage Categories.
column2: This prevents manual updating of category positions in Manage Categories.

column1: When a category contains more products than this number, then Ajax page loads are enabled. Leave field empty to disable Ajax page loads - however, this may cause large categories not to load properly in the drag-and-drop window.
column2: When a category contains more products than this number, then Ajax page loads are enabled. Leave field empty to disable Ajax page loads - however, this may cause large categories not to load properly in the drag-and-drop window.

column1: When new products get included in a category for the first time by a smart category rule, this setting determines whether they are automatically added to the top or bottom of the category.
column2: When new products get included in a category for the first time by a smart category rule, this setting determines whether they are automatically added to the top or bottom of the category.
